name: Rogue Office
description:
Mellow has entered a strange building, where something isn't quite right. Armed with her trusty bat ''Yellow'', she will explore this place and figure out what in the world it is. Spooky times lay and wait.

This is a small prototype of a game that I've tried my hardest to put together, it is not complete. I still had a lot of fun making it and will continue to improve and make new, great things!

Very Low Note by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4581-very-low-note
